name: Snips & Snails (itch)
description:
Snips & Snails is an 18+ otome game featuring four love interests of different supernatural species referred to as the Arcane, or Arcs. Play as the female protagonist to learn about and possibly romance one of the main characters. Currently the demo features the common route, which is an introduction to the game and the urban fantasy you find yourself in, along with Chapter 1 of Sullivan and Quinn's stories. 

Backgrounds used within the demo are placeholders. 

If you enjoyed the game's demo and are looking to support development, feel free to donate to my ko-fi! https://ko-fi.com/lacydigital

Join our discord to talk about the game, get updates, and just chat about all things related to visual novels! https://discord.gg/M8BscDB

Feel free to leave any critique, comments, or bug catches below! This is a work in progress! I will be constantly updating the game and working on it. New updates will always be posted here, in the discord, and on the ko-fi!
